PROFILE 
 
Tracy is a dedicated and committed person with vast experience in Food Safety, Health and Safety 
and Environmental Health. Excellent communicator, negotiator and leader who adopts a result 
orientated approach to all endeavours, delivering projects, objectives and achieving high levels of 
success in all roles and teams. Dedicated, flexible and innovative person who enjoys new challenges 
and relishes the opportunity to enhance the performance of people and an organisation.

businesses and enforcing food hygiene and health and safety legislation. Working for vario TRACY GUNDRY  
4 Seagent Place, Consett, County Durham, DH8 0TR  
Tel: 07951177795  
Email: shamusdodds@gmail.com 
 
PROFILE 
 
Tracy is a dedicated and committed person with vast experience in Food Safety, Health and Safety 
and Environmental Health. Excellent communicator, negotiator and leader who adopts a result 
orientated approach to all endeavours, delivering projects, objectives and achieving high levels of 
success in all roles and teams. Dedicated, flexible and innovative person who enjoys new challenges 
and relishes the opportunity to enhance the performance of people and an organisation.  
 
Tracy qualified as an Environmental Health Officer in 1996 and spent the next 12 years educating 
businesses and enforcing food hygiene and health and safety legislation. Working for various local 
authorities across the UK she gained knowledge of a wide variety of industries and in her later roles 
she was responsible for managing a team of enforcement officers. Of note, in her last role Tracy 
worked with the Food Standards Agency on the Scores on the Doors scheme, which was 
subsequently rolled out across the UK. 
 
In 2008 Tracy left the local authority sector to sharpen her skills and experience further as a Senior 
Health and Safety and Food Hygiene Consultant, looking after a range of industrial and commercial 
clients, before taking up a similar post with Drury PSM in 2009. Drury PSM was bought by The 
Alcumus Group in 2011, after which Tracy gained corporate experience and took the role of Health 
and Safety Technical lead, Team Manager, Project Manager and finally PSM sales Manager 
overseeing and driving the rejuvenation of the Alcumus SME proposition. Her current role includes 
business development, account management as well as consultancy. 
 
CAREER SUMMARY 
 
2019 to DATE: ALCUMUS PSM SALES MANAGER & SENIOR HEALTH AND SAFETY 
CONSULTANT  
 
 Technical support and management of a growing, yet capable and sustainable business 
development and account management function that delivers strong revenue growth.  
 Development of sales strategies with marketing and implementing associated targets. 
 Monitoring performance and motivating within the business development and account 
management teams to ensure sales targets are exceeded. 
 Reporting of revenue against budget/forecast and KPI’s to SMT and supporting VP in that activity 
at board level. 
 Increasing business opportunities through various routes to market , including internal upsell, 
cross sell and self-generation. 
 CRM champion for the PSM area, ensuring correct use and driving improvements.  
 Successfully reached annual budget for new business in July of 2020, ultimately delivering 
almost 3 times the budget amount, which resulted in the accolade of ‘Team of the Year’ for 2020. 
 Renewal of several key accounts in year, ensuring service delivery met client needs whilst also 
maximising revenue. Success and behaviour very much based on close, strong relationships and 
honesty around what has been and can be delivered. 
 Development and maintenance of close relationships within the operational teams across the 
Company, to maximise new business potential and leverage expertise where necessary when 
discussing new or existing opportunities.  
 Health and Safety and Food Hygiene lead on several key accounts where support was required, 
which includes auditing and legally compliant documentation and more complex discussions 
around needs and deliverables. 
 Ensure the Company values are upheld and all interactions are professional, with two way 
communication. 
 
 
 
2017 to 2019: ALCUMUS PSM PROJECT MANAGER  
 
 Operational Management of the PSM Business Unit and representation at Board Level.  
 Food Hygiene lead on several key accounts where support was required, which includes HACCP 
reviews and auditing. 
 Creation of a PSM team with a supportive but challenging culture, one that drives operational 
excellence and efficiency to drive the business forward, reinforcing its market position.  
 The market face of PSM. 
 Develop and implement the business unit strategy, communicate it widely and enhance the 
market.
